call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - August 28th

decisions.decision: AMAs moving to full-on community peer-to-peer AMAs for the time being
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Evolution of Ergo to be more community-centric
decisions.quote: AMAs in the future are going, for the time being, moving to full-on community peer-to-peer AMAs

decisions.decision: Moving AMAs off the official EF channel to a community event
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Moving everything off EF servers with the InfraDAO
decisions.quote: We're moving everything off EF servers with the InfraDAO. Why not take AMAs and move them off the official propped up EF channel to a community event

commitments.commitment: Start seeing promotions about community AMAs at least five days in advance
commitments.quote: You'll start seeing promotions about that at least five days in advance

commitments.commitment: Community AMAs will start off similar to how they did before and see how that goes
commitments.quote: We'll start off similar to how we did before and see how that goes

commitments.commitment: Send spare machine to third person for InfraDAO once fourth person is up
commitments.quote: they're actually going to get one of my spare machines here. We're going to send it to them

commitments.commitment: AI knowledge base project will be available in the next couple of weeks
commitments.quote: this is something cool that I think you'll probably see in the next couple of weeks or so as I'm working on it
